transcript:
Customer: Hello Amit ka kharab kar di.
Halo?

Executive: Hanji sir good afternoon.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan good afternoon sir.
Customer: Imran baat kar raha tha sir main senior manager India Mart Noida head office se. Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Actually sir abhi aapka discussion hua hoga Anshika ke sath sir service se related hai na sir?
Aur unhone aapko over the whatsapp ek bylit bhi aapko share kiya tha sir. Bas aapka ek feedback aaya tha sir not satisfied ka sir bas usi regarding maine lagaya sir. Bataiye sir ki aapse jo discuss hua Anshika ke sath sir. Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji sir voice aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Voice aa rahi hai sir aa raha hai.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sir clear voice? Hanji sir main wohi keh raha sir ki abhi aapka service se related sir discuss hua hoga Anshika ke sath hai na sir?
Customer: Okay. Okay.
Executive: Hanji sir. Hanji sir. Toh unhone ek whatsapp pe aapko ek bylit bhi share kiya tha. Theek hai? Toh wohi aapse jaanna chah raha tha sir ki aapne ek feedback hamare paas diya tha not satisfied ka sir ki aap Anshika ke discussion se sir satisfied nahi the sir.
Customer: Satisfied nahi raha sir koi barabar.
Executive: Hanji sir. Toh wohi main jaanna chah raha tha sir ki bataiye sir ki kahan pe problem aayi sir? Jo bhi cheezein Anshika ne aapko guide kiya tha.
Customer: Hamara jo problem bole toh Anshika sahi order nahi aa raha company se. Ek dusra aa raha hai Bengaluru, Maharashtra woh aa raha hai. Hyderabad Andhra Pradesh Telangana ka order hamare ko hona hum unko supply karta. Dusra mahina supply karte Bengaluru dusra. Hmm hmm. Toh abhi abhi dusra long hai na long paisa dene nahi dete company wala long wala. Hyderabad wale toh jyada paisa.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai sir ki aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye sir jaise aapko bylit jo chahiye hogi sir woh Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh ka aapko bylit chahiye hai na sir?
Customer: Hao.
Executive: Hai na sir Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh se aapko bylit chahiye. Aapko bylit Bengaluru aur Hyderabad se nahi chahiye aap yeh cheez keh rahe ho sir?
Customer: Hyderabad Hyderabad Bengaluru Odisha woh nahi nahi nahi jaunga.
Executive: Achcha matlab aapko Bengaluru aur Hyderabad ka bylit nahi chahiye aapko Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh ka bylit chahiye hai na sir?
Customer: Hao.
Executive: Theek hai main ek kaam kar raha hu sir. Dekhiye sir aap location filter sir use karte hain sir?
Customer: Hao use karta.
Executive: Hanji sir. Aap location filter se dekhiye hum na bylit part pe sir ek location ka filter dete hain. Jaise maan lijiye sir agar aapko Telangana location ke bylit chahiye aap Telangana location ka bylit sir filter use kijiye sir aapko Telangana location se na jo bhi bylit hamare paas available hogi sir definitely woh aapko dikhegi sir. Same sir agar aapko Hyderabad hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hanji sir. Same sir usi tarah se sir jaise maan lijiye Telangana ho gaya uske according aap sir Andhra Pradesh se aapko bylit chahiye aap Andhra Pradesh ka apna location matlab location pe jaake filter lagate hain toh hamare paas jo bhi bylit available hogi sir woh aapko dikhegi. Jaise main abhi black coal ka check kar raha tha sir aaj ke time pe toh nahi sir but kal ke date pe na ek Telangana location se sir do ton ka bylit available tha sir aapka black coal ko leke Mahbubnagar Telangana sir.
Theek hai? Toh iske according aap location laga ke sir aap apna use check kar sakte ho sir. Baki main aapka Andhra Pradesh se bhi check kar leta hu sir.
Customer: Yeh do ton ek ton hai ji 20 ton ke upar.
Executive: Aapka minimum order quantity kya hoga bataiye sir? 25 tons to 30 tons.
Executive: 25 tons to 30 tons hai na sir? Toh hum aap check kijiyega sir jahan pe hum location ka filter dete hain na wahan pe na hum do order value ka aapko ek aur filter dete hain sir. Wahan se aap amount wise bhi filter laga sakte ho ya bulk ya business se related bhi aap filter laga sakte ho sir. Suppose kijiye sir ki agar maine ek 50000 ke upar ka filter laga liya theek hai? Toh maine abhi check kiya sir toh ek minute main aapka Telangana location se hi check kar leta hu pehle sir ya nearby state se hi main aapka check kar leta hu ki hamare paas available hai ki nahi. Just ek minute sir.
Baki India Mart ka application hai kya abhi available sir aapke paas phone mein?
Customer: Hao.
Executive: Ek baar aap open kar lenge sir?
Customer: Hao.
Executive: Taki main bhi aapko guide karta saku uske according aap bhi sir check kar sakte hain ya agar open kar liya aapne?
Customer: Open kar liya hai.
Executive: Hanji sir abhi ek baar bylit pe jayiyega aap?
Customer: Haan ja raha.
Executive: Bylit pe click kijiye sir.
Customer: Imported coal nahi black coal.
Executive: Bylit ha bylit pe na aap dekhiye sir upar location ka option aa raha hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Kahan location ji Kanpur.
Executive: Location ka aa raha hai na aapka? Toh wahan pe sir location pe na location ka option aa raha hai na aapko wahan pe filter ka location ke sath filter laga hua?
Halo? Okay. Haan.
Executive: Location ke sath filter laga hua option aa raha hai na sir aapke paas? Usme aap click kijiyega sir wahan pe aap Telangana likh dijiye ya phir Andhra Pradesh se jo bhi city aap target karte hain sir woh likh dijiye sir. Jaise maine check kiya Telangana se toh Telangana se abhi sir mere paas na bulk se related bylit aaj ke date mein sir available nahi hai. Kal hi ka ek bylit available tha sir black coal ka sir woh aapka Mahbubnagar Telangana se aaya hua tha sir.
Customer: Kahan hai Mahbubnagar kahan hai?
Executive: Hai na? Aap aapne sir location aapko mil gaya sir? Upar bylit ke upar jo aapko location aata hai.
Customer: Location hamara location Ramgundam Telangana.
Executive: Nahi nahi main woh nahi keh raha hu maine jaise aapne bylit pe click kiya sir toh location filter lagane ka aapko option mila sir ki location hum kaise choose matlab kar sakte hain Telangana mein kaise kar sakte hain Andhra Pradesh ko city hum kaise target kar sakte hain yeh mila sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi. Ek baar possible hoga toh kya hum video meeting mein connect kar sakte hain over the video meeting sir?
Customer: Main dekh raha hu. Hello main dekh raha hu.
Executive: Nahi main puch raha hu agar possible hoga toh kya ek baar hum over the video meeting connect kar sakte hain so that ek baar main aapko properly guide kar dunga sir uske according aap phir aap use karne lagenge sir. Jyada time aapka hum nahi lenge sir mujhe pata hai sir aap bhi busy rehte ho jyada time main aapka nahi lunga but main ek baar aapko proper tarike se sir guide kar dunga bas so that sir yeh problem aapko phir again and again na face karna pade sir.
Jaise aapne abhi bylit pe click kiya toh abhi aapke paas kya kya option aa raha hai aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Aah.
Executive: Hanji sir abhi aapke paas kya kya option aa rahe hain? 50 tons mein ha wohi Gujarat hai. Haan?
Customer: Gujarat Gujarat hai.
Executive: Hello bylit pe aap click kar rahe the sir ek recent karke dikh raha hai sir recent?
Customer: Aah ek aah Balasore Odisha.
Executive: Nahi main keh raha hu jaise bylit pe aapne click kiya toh bylit pe aapko recent ka option kahin pe dikh raha hai recent likha hua recent relevant recent ka option aapko mil raha hai?
Customer: Hello. Haan Kolkata Bengal West Bengal.
Executive: Nahi main jo cheez aapko puch raha hu main woh bataiye na sir main keh raha hu location ka matlab aapko recent ka option kahin pe dikh raha hai sir?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan kal kal baat kar rahe hain aap time.
Executive: Theek hai main kal kis time pe laga lu bataiye sir? Kal kal 10 baje lagao 10 baje. 10 baje 10 baje subah morning mein na?
Customer: Haan morning subah.
Executive: Theek hai aap mera na number save kar lijiye sir main kal 10 baje morning mein aapko laga lunga mera naam Imran hua main yahan pe senior manager ke post mein hu theek hai sir? Baki ha baki ha baki sir kya hua hai na sir ki jaise aap feedback dete ho na toh ek hamare paas na concern open ho jata hai. Hyderabad Hyderabad Hyderabad party hai na tumhara office hai na Hyderabad mein? Sir actually abhi aapka account jo hai na sir woh hamare head office Noida se sir handle kar rahe hain theek hai? Aur aap nishchit rahiye sir sari branch branch Hyderabad mein hai na?
Executive: Sir branch hamare Hyderabad mein hai but account aapka Noida head office se hum handle kar rahe hain aur aap nishchit rahiye sir sari cheezein hum aapko proper tarike se guide karenge aur koi bhi issue hota hai na sir again and again maan lijiye ek baar mein nahi samajh mein aata phir hum dobara bhi aapko samjhayenge aur sari cheezein hum aapko proper tarike se guide karenge uske liye aap nishchit rahiye theek hai sir? Baki main kal aapko morning mein 10 baje lagata hu sir. Abhi sir kya hua hai na ki jaise aapne feedback diya hai na over the whatsapp sir toh hamare paas sir ek ticket open ho gaya hai sir isiliye maine aapko samne se call kiya tha theek hai? Agar aapka permission ho toh main isko close kar du sir?
Customer: Close kar do kal subah 10 baje phir woh karo.
Executive: Haan theek hai main kal subah 10 baje aapko connect kar lunga baki main is ticket ko close kar de ha baki main is ticket ko abhi close kar du sir?
Customer: Haan close karo.
Executive: Theek hai baki hamare call ke regarding jo mera aur aapka discussion hua hai na sir iske regarding ek feedback aayega mail pe sir apna feedback jarur share kijiyega aur main morning 10 o clock aapko call karunga theek hai?
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan baki main isko close karwa raha hu abhi theek hai sir?
Customer: Close close karo.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir thank you sir have a nice day sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving orders from preferred locations.

- Wants orders from Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.

- Dissatisfied with the service provided by Anshika.



Resolution:

- Executive explained location filter usage on IndiaMART.

- Executive offered a video meeting for guidance.

- Agreed to call the customer back at 10 AM.

- Closed the feedback ticket based on the discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 10 AM next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- location filter, buyleads, telangana, andhra pradesh
